column5: Hiya's,  Finally went out night fishing this year while on holiday with mixed results, had a heavy rod with heavy braid and a wire leader, using chunks of fish from the mornings mini session as bait.

Epic adventure!!!!  You must have done a ton of local research before going?  I love ling but you couldn't pay me money to touch an eel outta the ocean. Nasty looking creatures!  So cool just random wildlife around!
Look like a lot of fun, not sure I would be down with traipsing through the bush at night. The thought of those big ass spiders makes my skin crawl. The eel and the crab where very cool.
I finally got around to watching that and well, that's one walk I sure wouldn't do solo at night.  Too bad you didn't find more (or plan to) crab's and get a meal out of them too   Next time...
wicked - love the last half where you're fishing with the "short" rod. I'd have had to do a little more editing at the point where it snapped than you had to . At least it wasn't the St Croix.
eels and hand bombing a shark....that's good times!
